resources.string: Paina Cafe
Home
Menu
Locations
Account

Pā´ina in Hawaiian means “gathering”. It’s a very simple word, but it strongly represents family and relationships. At Pā´ina Café, we feel that great food is the catalyst that binds relationships closer together. The tastiest and freshest foods help inspire conversation, creativity, fun, and happiness.
About Us

Pā´ina Café was named one of \"The 17 Most Important Restaurants In Honolulu\" by Summer Nakaishi, Thrillist.com, on July 27, 2015, and selected as one of \"America\'s most amazing meals for $10 or less\" by Cheap Tickets in 2015. Pā´ina Café was also featured on OC16\'s television show, 6 Picks, and selected by Hawaii celebrity hosts as one of Hawaii\'s favorite poke in 2016.
HOME OF THE ORIGINAL POKE BOWL
Our island freshly mixed poke served as poke bowls, salad toppings, or take it home and create your own.
POKE:
Spicy Tuna, Shoyu Ahi, Hot Shoyu Ahi , Shoyu Ginger Salmon, Limu Ahi, Wasabi Masago Ahi , Sweet Chili Tofu, and Daily Poke Specials when available.
TOPPINGS:

Tempura Flakes, Natto, Taegu, Kim Chee, Takuan, Shredded Nori, Furikake, Masago, Pickled Onions, Green Onion, Seaweed Salad, Kyuri-zuke (Pickled Cucumbers), and Yamakake Style(Yamaimo, Nori, & Green Onion)
PLATES
Healthy, but no sacrifice on taste. Our plate lunches will keep you on the go.
SANDWICHES
We have a wide variety of sandwich choices. Pair it up with a side salad or soup.
SALADS
Crispy and flavorful our salads are served as a meal or on the side.
